channel.title: Need help with renaming items & Making pk areas
channel.description:
can any one help I can't seem to find out how to rename items and i also dont know how to make pk areas.
[b]EDITED:[/b] I also cant seem to find it in the forums... so ya..
if any one can help it will be appreciate.

item.title: Need help with renaming items & Making pk areas
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

class8.java is in your client.
public boolean isInWilderness will be in your server files, client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with renaming items & Making pk areas

item.title: Need help with renaming items & Making pk areas
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

  1. I belive to rename items you change the names in the class8 class in your client.
  2. For pk area’s i think you need to add it to your public boolean isInWilderness
    Note:not really that sure on 2 as i havn’t made one myself =\ but i’m pretty sure its correct.

Read full topic
